name: 3D Shuffle-Board Lite
description:
3D Shuffle-Board Lite is realistic 3d shuffleboard game, it have powerful 3D physical engine.

you can play it again your friend.

if you love shuffle bard game, you must try to play this game! Let's go now!

Featrues:
* Real 3D physics engine delivers weight.
* Controls are easy to grasp, but a challenge to master.
* Interactive Touch Screen Play.
* A full desktop display showing the current status of competition.
